sentences.english: The warfare becomes critical like this, having may let Gong does the east rather and alone go to the capital?
sentences.chinese: 战事这样吃紧，有没有可能让龚东宁单独进京？

sentences.english: I had no clear idea of the progress of fighting in the Philippines.
sentences.chinese: 当时我对于菲律宾战事的进行状况并无明确印象。

sentences.english: Nation will not take up sword against nation, nor will they train for war anymore.
sentences.chinese: 这国不举刀攻击那国，他们也不再学习战事。

sentences.english: Five hundred years without a war.
Two reporters were sent to cover the war.
sentences.chinese: 派去两名记者采访有关战事的新闻。

sentences.english: It is finally in a war, wei Moji gets hurt toxic.
sentences.chinese: 最后在一场战事中，卫无忌受伤中毒。

sentences.english: Denisov asked him nothing either of the regiment or of the general progress of the war.
sentences.chinese: 杰尼索夫既不询问兵团的情形，也不询问战事的进程。

sentences.english: So the war in the south is very good for you?
sentences.chinese: 所以南部的战事对你来说是大好事了？

sentences.english: The situation has only gotten worse with recent escalations.
sentences.chinese: 随着最近战事的升级，形势已经更趋恶化了。

sentences.english: The temporary philanthropic enterprise of the Red Swastika included redemptive activities in the time of war and famine.
sentences.chinese: 红卍字会的临时慈业包括战事救助和灾荒救助。

sentences.english: Fortress filling amuck and wars being going to launch.
sentences.chinese: 军事要塞充满肃杀感，战事一触即发。

sentences.english: After the taking of La Haie-Sainte the battle wavered.
sentences.chinese: 在夺取了圣拉埃以后，战事形成了相持不下的局面。

sentences.english: The siege campaign on Yingzhou was a major warfare in the Nian Army's history.
sentences.chinese: 颍州围城战役是捻军史上的重大战事。

sentences.english: The Libya intervention is not the first fuzzily defined war.
sentences.chinese: 干预利比亚并非第一场定义浑沌不明的战事。

sentences.english: We very much hope that we can resume our mutually beneficial relationship now that peace has returned to Lebanon.
sentences.chinese: 现今战事平息，亟盼能重展双方互惠的业务联系。

definition: to put down a revolt/to pacify a rebellion
to reinforce/to increase troop numbers/reinforcements/extra troops
to go on or send a punitive expedition
